---
description: Components allow a visualization of data on the huddu dashboard
---

# Components

```json
{
    "name": "string", 
    "description": "string/markdown",
    "avatar_url": "string/link",
    "account": "string/author_id",
    "schema": {
        "required_var":"string/type"
    },
    "html": "string/validHTMLcode",
    "id": "string/autogenerated",
    "meta": {
        "field_name":"metadata"
    }
}

```
